articles.title: Welcome to Nuxpresso
articles.seo_description: NUXPRESSO is a static website generator to work with Strapi CMS. Create pages, templates and blocks using MOKAStudio visual blocks builder.

articles.title: MOKAStudio
articles.seo_description: MOKAStudio is a visual blocks builder to create page, templates and blocks that you can compose to create stunning websites using nuxpresso

articles.title: Contact Us
articles.seo_description: If you are interested in nuxpresso please contact me.

articles.title: Site Generator
articles.seo_description:
Based on NUXTJS and StrapiCMS build fast static websites ready to be published on any hosting provider.
SSR support included if required.

articles.title: Headless CMS
articles.seo_description: Nuxpresso uses Strapi CMS as backend CMS to create pages and a full website.

articles.title: Nuxt Dynamic Routes
articles.seo_description: Learn how to create dynamic routes in NuxtJS
